thread.section_title: Hotel Belleclaire - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The perfect hotel!
thread.title_full: The perfect hotel! - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ryan G
title: The perfect hotel!
text: Stayed in hotel Belleclaire for 4 nights and can't help but recommend. Perfect location next to the 79th st and 72nd st subway stations and close walk to Central Park. Room beautiful and excellent staff. Quiet location with cafes and bars in close proximity and a short subway journey to Times Square. You won't be disappointed would stay there again even at a higher cost.
